author: kyungminparkdrums
body:
#### PR description:

This PR changes the input tag names for the ECAL DQM GPU client so that it can be compatible with the Alpaka HLT menu . See JIRA ticket [CMSHLT-3139](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3139) for more information. 

* `hltEcalDigisFromGPU` -> `hltEcalDigis`
* `hltEcalDigisLegacy` -> `hltEcalDigisCPUSerial`
* `hltEcalUncalibRecHitLegacy` -> `hltEcalUncalibRecHitCPUSerial`
* `hltEcalUncalibRecHitFromSoA` -> `hltEcalUncalibRecHit`

This PR should not be merged, but should be applied as a patch to the cmssw currently used in production for online DQM, since another update of the input tag names is scheduled to happen in late April. 

#### PR validation:

This PR should be validated on the playback with a run which used the alpaka HLT menu.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is a temporary patch to the current production version of `14_0_X`, and there is no need for backports.
title: [DO NOT MERGE] Update ECAL DQM GPU client input tag names for the Alpaka Module [14_0_X]
